snippet: A new book about a knife maker in Michigan coincides with an auction of his goods; a book about Charles R. Knight, an artist known for works for museums, is out; and a Gorey exhibition is on tap.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; new book about knife maker William W Scagel coincides with an auction of his goods; a book about Charles R Knight, an artist known for works for museums, is out; Columbia University's Rare Book and Manuscript Library puts possessions of illustrator Edward Gorey on display in Gorey Preserved exhibition.
lead_paragraph: A new book about a knife maker in Michigan coincides with an auction of his goods; a book about Charles R. Knight, an artist known for works for museums, is out; and a Gorey exhibition is on tap.
